articles.description: Menstrual cramps are uncomfortable and painful sensations felt around the abdominal region during a menstrual cycle.
articles.content: Full of fibre, oats are not only nutritious but they help keep you satiated for a long period of time. Addtionally, they are rich in zinc and magnesium, which helps lower your menstrual pain.
